pipeline.lumi_lights.name: Lumi Lights LITE
pipeline.lumi_shadow_0x.name: Lumi Lights 0.3x
pipeline.lumi_shadow_0x.desc: Lumi Lights with low shadow resolution
pipeline.lumi_shadow_1x.name: Lumi Lights 1x
pipeline.lumi_shadow_1x.desc: Lumi Lights with medium shadow resolution
pipeline.lumi_shadow_2x.name: Lumi Lights 2x
pipeline.lumi_shadow_2x.desc: Lumi Lights with high shadow resolution
pipeline.lumi_shadow_4x.name: Lumi Lights 4x

config.lumi_lights.help.tone_profile: Affects the contrast range between various light sources.;Auto-exposure is recommended for High Contrast profile.
config.lumi_lights.help.outdoors_brightn: Brightness of the sun in dimensions with sky
config.lumi_lights.help.handheld_light_r: Max reach of held light source. Set to 0 to disable
config.lumi_lights.help.ambient_brightne: Base ambient light for all dimensions
config.lumi_lights.help.nether_ambient_b: Ambient light from the lava lakes in the nether
config.lumi_lights.help.end_ambient_brig: Ambient light in dimensions without sky, like the End
config.lumi_lights.help.night_ambient_br: Ambient light from the moon in dimensions with sky
config.lumi_lights.help.refraction_effec: Distort objects behind water and glass
config.lumi_lights.help.reflection_overs: Over-sample screen space reflection which ;may help fill gaps in the reflection.
config.lumi_lights.help.reflection_maxim: Limits screen space reflection based on roughness;(water=1, dirt=10) Lower to improve performance.
config.lumi_lights.help.lightrays_mode: Light rays mode ;Volumetric impacts performance and ;requires shadows to be enabled.
config.lumi_lights.help.lightrays_intens: Intensity of light rays effect from the sun
config.lumi_lights.help.ambient_occlusio: Ambient occlusion mode. SSAO affects performance.
config.lumi_lights.help.ssao_num_steps: Number of sampling steps, affects precision.;(HIGH performance impact)
config.lumi_lights.help.ssao_num_directi: Number of sampling directions, affects quality.;(HIGH performance impact)
config.lumi_lights.help.ssao_bias: Angle bias in radians, affects intensity
config.lumi_lights.help.ssao_use_attenua: Distance attenuation, turning off will create outline effect
config.lumi_lights.help.ssao_glow: Also calculate color imparted by glowing objects
config.lumi_lights.help.sky_mode: Choose between different skybox rendering modes
config.lumi_lights.help.lumi_sky_red: Sky red value (Lumi sky custom color mode)
config.lumi_lights.help.lumi_sky_green: Sky green value (Lumi sky custom color mode)
config.lumi_lights.help.lumi_sky_blue: Sky blue value (Lumi sky custom color mode)
config.lumi_lights.help.lumi_star_size: Size of stars (Lumi or starry sky mode)
config.lumi_lights.help.lumi_star_densit: Density of stars (Lumi or starry sky mode)
config.lumi_lights.help.lumi_star_bright: Brightness of stars (Lumi or starry sky mode)
config.lumi_lights.help.parallax_cloud_a: Altitude of parallax clouds in the sky
config.lumi_lights.help.parallax_cloud_t: How much the parallax clouds fill the sky
config.lumi_lights.help.volumetric_cloud: Altitude of volumetric clouds in the sky
Volumetric clouds rendering mode. ;Skybox clouds are generally faster.
config.lumi_lights.help.cloud_coverage_r: Base sky coverage for volumetric clouds
config.lumi_lights.help.flat_clouds: Cirrus-like clouds ;Must be off for vanilla clouds
config.lumi_lights.help.water_color: Whether to retain water texture and color
config.lumi_lights.help.fog_far_chunks: Distance where fog gets the thickest in chunks
config.lumi_lights.help.underwater_fog_f: Distance where fog gets the thickest in chunks (underwater)
config.lumi_lights.help.horizon_blend_re: Smoothness of blending with the sky on the horizon
config.lumi_lights.help.glint_mode: Switch between texture-based or shader-based;enchantment glint
config.lumi_lights.help.shadow_workaroun: Workaround to fix patches in shadow map
config.lumi_lights.help.multi_bounce_ref: Use temporal data to simulate;multi-bounce reflection.
config.lumi_lights.help.kaleidoskop: K a l e i d o s k o p i k	r e f l e k t i f	m e t a l i k	b l o k.
config.lumi_lights.help.exposure_func: Exposure compute function. Default is median.
config.lumi_lights.help.antialiasing: Filtering technique to remove noise and jagged edges
config.lumi_lights.help.dithering_mode: Noise technique used for dithering AO, reflection, and volumetrics.;Blue noise requires texture loading support.
config.lumi_lights.help.parallax_cloud_d: Density of parallax clouds. Don't use for normal gameplay.
config.lumi_lights.help.taa_debug_render: Render TAA debug buffers instead of the game
config.lumi_lights.help.cloud_time: Whether volumetric cloud synchronizes with client;time or in-game world time.
config.lumi_lights.help.overlay_debug: Separate overlays by rendering them differently
